name: CW Author Info
author: antocara

sections.description:
Add a box with information about the author of each post after post written by that author.
This box will display information in bio of each writer’s blog, a link to every post written by this author, avatar, and a series of icons link to author profile on social networks
are known as Facebooks, Twitter, Google+ and icon for contact by email.

All these data the author of this post are collected from the profile of each author which have incorporated the necessary fields to fill.
Author Info also has a widget in which appear a list of all components of the blog who have permission to write to the blog. This widget also displays the avatar of the author,
his name with a link to a list of all posts written by him, the same icons to link to your profile on social networks and the number of written post.
The box appears with the author’s information after each post is configurableboth in its background color, the color of the lettering and decorative border color of the table below.

Author info is configured for use in multi mode to be available in:

  • Spanish
  • English
  • Italian (gracias @cento)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder with all files to your WordPress wp-content/pluginsdirectory
  2. Activate the plugin from the panel of housing management
  3. From the panel user profile fields are filled in the existing new Facebook, Twitter and Google +
  4. The administration panel is configured Author Info background color, fontcolor and border color
  5. I hope it will be useful
